item.title: Simon & Garfunkel - Scarborough Fair / Canticle - Key of E
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of E Dorian (built on the second step of the D Major scale)
Chords Used: Em, D, G, A
As performed by Simon & Garfunkel
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/M0x_G4eA71w
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The art work is by Pieter Brueghel the Younger (1534-1638) and is entitled "Flemish Fair."
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And you are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Simon & Garfunkel - Scarborough Fair / Canticle - Baritone Ukulele
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele. Key of E Dorian (built on the second step of the D Major scale)

item.title: Simon & Garfunkel - The 59th Street Bridge Song - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C. Lowered from the original key just over three half-steps (330 cents).
As performed by Simon & Garfunkel.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Simon & Garfunkel - The 59th Street Bridge Song - Key of F
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of F. Raised from the original key almost a whole step (170 cents).
As performed by Simon & Garfunkel.
This is a great song to practice using your pinky! Leave the pinky finger on the first string, third fret, all the time!
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Simon & Garfunkel - The Sound of Silence - Key of Em
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G/Em
As performed by Simon & Garfunkel
This song was in the movie Trolls, and one of my son’s friends came over the other day, and as we opened the door, he savant, “Hello darkness, my old friend.” Yep...had to make a play along.
Looking for specific content? Send me an e-mail (visit the blog for e-mail)
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Simon & Garfunkel - Cecilia - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
As performed by Simon and Garfunkel.
Dr. Jill Reese, creator of this style of play along, has a full version of Cecilia (https://youtu.be/B1l8YP2ZfrI) I was uncomfortable with the second verse in an educational setting and removed it. This is also Simon and Garfunkel’s version, tweaked in pitch to match standard tuning—but the original recording itself wavers in pitch quite a bit.
Need to practice at a different tempo? Use the gear icon in the video (lower right) to slow down (or speed up) the tempo at pitch! Need to do so on an iPad or iPhone? Check out the browser called "iCab Mobile" which has a Module called "Video Playback Rate"
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Simon & Garfunkel - El Condor Pasa - Key of Em, G
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Keys of Em & G.
As performed by Simon & Garfunkel.
Need to practice at a different tempo? Use the gear icon in the video (lower right) to slow down (or speed up) the tempo at pitch! Need to do so on an iPad or iPhone? Check out the browser called "iCab Mobile" which has a Module called "Video Playback Rate"
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Simon & Garfunkel - El Condor Pasa
item.description: This Song belongs Simon and Garfunkel, but it works quite nicely on Uke. They are awesome buy lots of the CDs
